::Prowl::

Prowl nods at Iris' directions and listens to her explanation of TM2 
technology. He couldn't breed? He didn't know that, but then his TM2 
body was fairly new. Listening to the part about Dinobot, he thinks 
back to the rescue mission he and Dinobot launched to get Iron Raptor 
and Tavatron back from the Alliance. He catches Iron Raptor's look 
after Iris asks for his opinion, getting the point and keeping his 
mouth shut.

Prowl snaps his head toward Iris at her next statement, an irrational 
wave of jealousy passing through him. Dinobot catching Iron Raptor's 
eye? For a second his mind denies the fact that Iris had said that, 
but hers and Iron Raptor's exchange after that confirmed Iris' 
statement. Iron Raptor was in fact looking up info on Dinobot.

But so what, Prowl thinks, As Iron Raptor said, she looked up info on 
the bots under her command. But Prowl somehow didn't think she looked 
up info on Ramulus or Striker or the other Maximals as well. Iris had 
said that Iron Raptor and Dinobot were the same species, perhaps Iron 
Raptor did have an eye for Dinobot after all.

It would make sence. Prowl didn't remember Dinobot ever crashing 
through several trees and nearly killing himself in the proccess. He 
knew that he probably wouldn't stand a chance against Dinobot in a 
fight, either. But he hoped Iron Raptor had fallen in love with him 
for Prowl himself, not for his abilities, or physical appearance.

He returns Iron Raptor's amused look with one not amused at all, 
trying to keep all the emotions surging through him out of his 
appearance, but not completely succeding. Suddenly, the thought of 
Dinobot being captured back on that rescue mission didn't look too 
bad. Prowl tore his mind away from the thought, but then found 
himself thinking of what Iron Raptor might have replied if Iris had 
been allowed to finish her last statement.

"Ok," he says as he pushes the thoughts out of his head, trying to 
keep his voice cheerful and failing miserably, "Lets get this spark 
merge done and over with."

His systems were searching through his datatracks to see how to 
accomplish the procedure Iris had explained with the greatest 
proficiency.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
